content:
ICS 1C HW 2 for QQ Skeleton -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:Brian C. Gibbons
E-mail: easu1586@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: Economics

Three neat Web finds:

  1. I was able to find out about automobiles.
  2. I was able to learn about the Beatles.
  3. I was able to learn about political party platforms such as the libertarian party.

Questions I can now answer
  1. Q-What is Vitual Memory?
  2. Where are some places on the web where I can find out about Free Market Economics? rmation.
  3. Can the WWW be used to reduce search costs when you are going to purchase something such as a car?
  4. What is a URL?
  5. Is there places on the web that I can learn more about current and past Rock and Rollers?
  1. Q-What is Vitual Memory?
    Virtual memeory allows the computer to use the hard disk for RAM. This can prove to be very valuble when you are working with a limited amount of RAM. A good virtual memeory program will opitimze the amount of RAM you have. In other words it allocates most of the RAM for the programs are currently being used. For the programs that are in the background thier RAm demand is satisfied by the Hard disk. It is a lot slower but when you don't have the money to buy more simms it makes a lot of sense. a

    Return to list of questions.

  2. Where are some places on the web where I can find out about Free Market Economics?
    Actually, there are many. Since the web is so powerful it has a tremendous amount of information contained within it. In fact many of the political parties have their own home pages. These home pages will communicate lots of information about all aspects of the respective party. However, for Free Market Economics, the best place on the web would most certainly be the libertaian page The libertarians are the cahmpions of the free market. Infact in their political platform there are many references to this belief. Check it out.

    Return to list of questions.

  3. Can the WWW be used to reduce search costs when you are going to purchase something such as a car?
    My answer is... QQ3yes, there is. We all know that the more information availble the better decisions we cam make. And when we are shopping for something we sometimes have a high cost of search. For example, if you are shopping for a car it is somewhat costly in time to visit every dealership. However, the Web can be used to reveal a lot of information about car shopping with a smaller search cost. For example, if yo are interested in learning about a particular make of car you can go to the automobile home page. From this home page you can browse much information that covers almost evry make of car imaginable. Now still consider you are searching to buy a car, You might also want to know specific performance info about a particular model the web can do this. For instance if you wanted to know the performance potential of a camaro you could click here.

    Return to list of questions.

  4. What is a URL?
    My answer is... QQ4 A URL is a Uniform Resource Locater. It is basically an address for a document on the www. The first part of the address defines the protocal. Inother words what type of language is going to be used between the client and server. The next part is the site of the computer. The third part refers to what port the client should connect to the server at. To find out more check out some of these articles in the ics1c reference section. However for specific instruction on creating URL's see "URL's and Naming resources on the web.

    Return to list of questions.

  5. Is there places on the web that I can learn more about current and past Rock and Rollers?
    My answer is... QQ5 You have come to the right place to find out about Rock and Roll. I guess there are alot of music fans that like computers as well. To begin with, ther is information on virtually every band. Check out this band list for instance. From here you can learn about anyone you like. However, if yo have the guts you can dig far enough to find out some interesting info about some famous bands. For instance you can learn about all of the beatles back masked messages on the web This is pretty interesting stuff. As you canlearn about the beatles you can also learn about brand new cutting edge bands as well just browse the ultimate band list.

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 15, 1995 for ICS 1C
